<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Computes a structural hash of a given function, considering the structure</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// and content of the function&#39;s instructions while allowing for selective</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ignoring of certain operands based on custom criteria. This hash can be used</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to identify functions that are structurally similar or identical, which is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// useful in optimizations, deduplication, or analysis tasks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\param F The function to hash.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\param IgnoreOp A callable that takes an instruction and an operand index,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// and returns true if the operand should be ignored in the hash computation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\return A FunctionHashInfo structure</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">FunctionHashInfo <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a26bee962bfc116c19a2acd57fe65d304">StructuralHashWithDifferences</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Function &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                               IgnoreOperandFunc IgnoreOp);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"></CodeLine>
